shortdesc.ph: Receives the raw audio data for ear monitoring.
Receives the raw audio data of the ear monitoring.
Receives the raw audio data for ear monitoring.
Gets the raw audio data for ear monitoring.

section.p: To ensure the ear monitoring audio data format meets expectations, you can set it as follows: Call to set the audio format, then call to register the audio frame observer. The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the parameters in this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

To ensure the ear monitoring audio data format meets expectations, you can configure it using the following methods: Call to set the audio format, and then call to register the audio frame observer. The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the parameters of this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

To ensure the audio data format for ear monitoring meets expectations, you can set the format using the following methods: Call to set the audio data format, then call to register the audio observer object. The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the parameters in this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

To ensure the ear monitoring audio data format meets expectations, you can call to set the audio format, then call to register the audio frame observer. The SDK calculates the sampling interval using the parameters in this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

ul.li: Due to framework limitations, this callback does not support sending the processed audio data back to the SDK.
